price: Dirán [a sus ídolos]: "Ustedes, con su poder, nos forzaron a seguirlos".
arabic: قَالُوٓاْ إِنَّكُمۡ كُنتُمۡ تَأۡتُونَنَا عَنِ ٱلۡيَمِينِ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: qālū innakum kuntum tatūnanā ʿani al-yamīni
